LanguageData.BloodthirstyTribe.label: Los sanguinarios Norbals
LanguageData.BloodthirstyTribe.description: Tu grupo escapó por poco de una aldea corrupta y abusiva. Sólo unos pocos de ustedes salieron y están planeando nunca volver. Tienes hambre y frío y has decidido que después de todo esto, era el momento de asentarse.\n\nTú jugarás para la raza Norbal.
LanguageData.BloodthirstyTribe.scenario.summary: Our group narrowly escaped a corrupt and abusive village. Only a few of you got out and are planning on never going back.
LanguageData.BloodthirstyTribe.scenario.parts.0.text: Your group narrowly escaped a corrupt and abusive village. Only a few of you got out and are planning on never going back. You are hungry and cold and have decided that after all this, it was time to settle down.
